Guardian:AcceleratePotion.NAME: Temporal Potion
DESCRIPTIONS: Accelerate all cards in Stasis twice.
Accelerate all cards in Stasis four times.

Guardian:BlockOnCardUsePotion.NAME: Armorer's Tincture
DESCRIPTIONS: Block each time you play a card this turn.
